text: What are the important language features (idioms) of Python to learn early on
I would be interested in knowing what the StackOverflow community thinks are the important language features (idioms) of Python.
Features that would define a programmer as Pythonic.
Python (pythonic) idiom - "code expression" that is natural or characteristic to the language Python.
Plus, Which idioms should all Python programmers learn early on?

childList.text: Plus, Which idioms should all Python programmers learn early on?
